name: Favonius Sword
desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.text: is available from all Character Event Wishes and Weapon Event Wishes, even when it is not a featured Weapon with a boosted drop-rate.

customize.name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
customize.desc: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.

customize.name: Vortex Vanquisher
customize.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

customize.name: Mitternachts Waltz
customize.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: Favonius Greatsword
customize.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

customize.name: Surf's Up
customize.desc: A commemorative item originally reserved for the champion of the "First All-Tribe Surfing Championship." Since said tournament is currently in the preparatory stage, the prize is in temporary storage at the Leisurely Puffer, with the shop owner as its custodian.

customize.name: Freedom-Sworn
customize.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Favonius Sword

customize.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
customize.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.name: Range Gauge
customize.desc: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.

customize.name: Prospector's Drill
customize.desc: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Cashflow Supervision
customize.desc: A floating device that can monitor certain phenomena. It was picked up and modified to serve other purposes following its abandonment.

customize.name: Elegy for the End
customize.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

customize.name: Range Gauge
customize.desc: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.

customize.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Freedom-Sworn
customize.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

customize.name: Light of Foliar Incision
customize.desc: The gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

customize.name: Mouun's Moon
customize.desc: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
customize.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Aqua Simulacra
customize.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

customize.name: Staff of Homa
customize.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

customize.name: Rust
customize.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.name: Skyward Blade
customize.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

customize.name: Aquila Favonia
customize.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

value.text: CRIT Hits have a <color=#37ffff>60%/70%/80%/90%/100%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#37ffff>12/10.5/9/7.5/6s</color> .

value.name: Favonius Sword
value.desc:
Windfall: Favonius Sword

"Legend has it that the knight that bore the title of Wolf Pup could cleave even raindrops with his blade, and the gates spurred by his blows were strong enough to snap roses.
Though none could match the heights of the Wolf Pup's prowess, the knights bear his oath of protection yet, his legacy lasting even to the present."

desc.text:
A standard longsword wielded by the Knights of Favonius. It is usually only issued after the approval of both the Master of the order and the Church.
The craftsmen in Mondstadt have achieved some results in elemental affinity by studying Mondstadt's Anemo.
This light and agile sword is not only an honor bestowed upon a Knight of Favonius, but also the fruit of the hard work and skills of the guardians of Mondstadt.
It can channel elemental power with ease. Its bearer would do well to remember that its sharp blade is intended for defending, not attacking.
The traditional art of Favonius Bladework was originated by the childhood friend and spiritual counterpart of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light, whose name was Rostam, the Wolf Pup.
Legend says he could chop each drop of rain out of the sky, and that the wind from his sword dance could split the rose and extinguish the torch.
In this lies the essence of Favonius Bladework: light, swift, and precise in the defense of Mondstadt.
At age twenty-seven, Rostam received the title of Wolf Pup.
Knights of Favonius tradition dictated that the titles of Lion and Wolf were reserved for those of great leadership potential.
Such individuals would one day assume the position of Grand Master, devoting themselves to the leadership of a multitude of knights and the safeguarding of Mondstadt.
But though he fulfilled his duties faithfully, and devoted himself to Mondstadt, Rostam would not live to see that day.
Since Rostam introduced the bladework style, no other practitioner has ever matched his legendary ability.
But his fervor, along with his will to protect Mondstadt, have stayed with the knights throughout the generations.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.
